patches.name: Alternative thumbnails
patches.description: Adds options to replace video thumbnails using the DeArrow API or image captures from the video.

patches.name: Ambient mode control
patches.description: Adds options to disable Ambient mode and to bypass Ambient mode restrictions.

patches.name: Bitrate default value
patches.description: Sets the audio quality to 'Always High' when you first install the app.

patches.name: Bypass URL redirects
patches.description: Adds an option to bypass URL redirects and open the original URL directly.

patches.name: Bypass image region restrictions
patches.description: Adds an option to use a different host for static images, so that images blocked in some countries can be received.

patches.name: Bypass image region restrictions
patches.description: Adds an option to use a different host for static images, so that images blocked in some countries can be received.

patches.name: Certificate spoof
patches.description: Enables YouTube Music to work with Android Auto by spoofing the YouTube Music certificate.

patches.name: Change form factor
patches.description: Adds an option to change the UI appearance to a phone, tablet, or automotive device.

patches.name: Change installer package name
patches.description: Spoof the installer package name to make it appear that the app was installed from the Google Play Store.

patches.name: Change live ring click action
patches.description: Adds an option to open the channel instead of the live stream when clicking on the live ring.

patches.name: Change player flyout menu toggles
patches.description: Adds an option to use text toggles instead of switch toggles within the additional settings menu.

patches.name: Change share sheet
patches.description: Adds an option to change the in-app share sheet to the system share sheet.

patches.name: Change share sheet
patches.description: Adds an option to change the in-app share sheet to the system share sheet.

patches.name: Change start page
patches.description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

patches.name: Change start page
patches.description: Adds an option to set which page the app opens in instead of the homepage.

patches.name: Change version code
patches.description: Changes the version code of the app to the value specified in patch options. Except when mounting, this can prevent app stores from updating the app and allow the app to be installed over an existing installation that has a higher version code. By default, the highest version code is set.

options.title: Version code
options.description: The version code to use. (1 ~ 2147483647)

patches.name: Custom Shorts action buttons
patches.description: Changes, at compile time, the icon of the action buttons of the Shorts player.

options.title: Shorts icon style
options.description: The style of the icons for the action buttons in the Shorts player.

patches.name: Custom branding icon for YouTube
patches.description: Changes the YouTube app icon to the icon specified in patch options.

options.title: App icon
options.description:
The icon to apply to the app.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain the following folders:

- mipmap-xxxhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-mdpi

Each of these folders must contain the following files:

- adaptiveproduct_youtube_background_color_108.png
- adaptiveproduct_youtube_foreground_color_108.png
- ic_launcher.png
- ic_launcher_round.png

options.title: Change splash icons
options.description: Apply the custom branding icon to the splash screen. Supports from YouTube 18.29.38 to YouTube 19.16.39.

options.title: Restore old splash animation
options.description:
Restore the old style splash animation.

This patch option is only supported on Android 12+, as splash animation was added to Android 12.

Including this patch option on Android 8.0 - 11 may cause your app to crash.

patches.name: Custom branding icon for YouTube Music
patches.description: Changes the YouTube Music app icon to the icon specified in patch options.

options.title: App icon
options.description:
The icon to apply to the app.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain the following folders:

- mipmap-xxxhdpi
- mipmap-xxhdpi
- mipmap-xhdpi
- mipmap-hdpi
- mipmap-mdpi

Each of these folders must contain the following files:

- adaptiveproduct_youtube_music_background_color_108.png
- adaptiveproduct_youtube_music_foreground_color_108.png
- ic_launcher_release.png

options.title: Change splash icons
options.description: Apply the custom branding icon to the splash screen.

options.title: Restore old splash icon
options.description:
Restore the old style splash icon.

If you enable both the old style splash icon and the Cairo splash animation,

Old style splash icon will appear first and then the Cairo splash animation will start.

patches.name: Custom branding name for YouTube
patches.description: Changes the YouTube app name to the name specified in patch options.

options.title: App name
options.description: The name of the app.

patches.name: Custom branding name for YouTube Music
patches.description: Changes the YouTube Music app name to the name specified in patch options.

options.title: App name in notification panel
options.description: The name of the app as it appears in the notification panel.

options.title: App name in launcher
options.description: The name of the app as it appears in the launcher.

patches.name: Custom double tap length
patches.description: Adds Double-tap to seek values that are specified in patch options.

options.title: Double-tap to seek values
options.description: A list of custom Double-tap to seek lengths to be added, separated by commas.

patches.name: Custom header for YouTube
patches.description: Applies a custom header in the top left corner within the app.

options.title: Custom header
options.description:
The header to apply to the app.

Patch option 'Custom branding icon' applies only when:

1. Patch 'Custom branding icon for YouTube' is included.
2. Patch option for 'Custom branding icon for YouTube' is selected from the preset.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:

- drawable-xxxhdpi
- drawable-xxhdpi
- drawable-xhdpi
- drawable-hdpi
- drawable-mdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:

[Generic header]

- yt_wordmark_header_light.png
- yt_wordmark_header_dark.png

The image dimensions must be as follows:

- drawable-xxxhdpi: 488px x 192px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 366px x 144px
- drawable-xhdpi: 244px x 96px
- drawable-hdpi: 184px x 72px
- drawable-mdpi: 122px x 48px

[Premium header]

- yt_premium_wordmark_header_light.png
- yt_premium_wordmark_header_dark.png

The image dimensions must be as follows:
- drawable-xxxhdpi: 516px x 192px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 387px x 144px
- drawable-xhdpi: 258px x 96px
- drawable-hdpi: 194px x 72px
- drawable-mdpi: 129px x 48px

patches.name: Custom header for YouTube Music
patches.description: Applies a custom header in the top left corner within the app.

options.title: Custom header
options.description:
The header to apply to the app.

Patch option 'Custom branding icon' applies only when:

1. Patch 'Custom branding icon for YouTube Music' is included.
2. Patch option for 'Custom branding icon for YouTube Music' is selected from the preset.

If a path to a folder is provided, the folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device:

- drawable-xxxhdpi
- drawable-xxhdpi
- drawable-xhdpi
- drawable-hdpi
- drawable-mdpi

Each of the folders must contain all of the following files:

- action_bar_logo.png
- logo_music.png
- ytm_logo.png

The image 'action_bar_logo.png' dimensions must be as follows:

- drawable-xxxhdpi: 320px x 96px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 240px x 72px
- drawable-xhdpi: 160px x 48px
- drawable-hdpi: 121px x 36px
- drawable-mdpi: 80px x 24px

The image 'logo_music.png' dimensions must be as follows:

- drawable-xxxhdpi: 576px x 200px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 432px x 150px
- drawable-xhdpi: 288px x 100px
- drawable-hdpi: 217px x 76px
- drawable-mdpi: 144px x 50px

The image 'ytm_logo.png' dimensions must be as follows:

- drawable-xxxhdpi: 412px x 144px
- drawable-xxhdpi: 309px x 108px
- drawable-xhdpi: 206px x 72px
- drawable-hdpi: 155px x 54px
- drawable-mdpi: 103px x 36px

patches.name: Dark theme
patches.description: Changes the app's dark theme to the values specified in patch options.

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

options.title: MaterialYou
options.description: Applies the MaterialYou theme for Android 12+ devices.

patches.name: Description components
patches.description: Adds options to hide and disable description components.

patches.name: Disable Cairo splash animation
patches.description: Adds an option to disable Cairo splash animation.

patches.name: Disable QUIC protocol
patches.description: Adds an option to disable CronetEngine's QUIC protocol.

patches.name: Disable QUIC protocol
patches.description: Adds an option to disable CronetEngine's QUIC protocol.

patches.name: Disable dislike redirection
patches.description: Adds an option to disable redirection to the next track when clicking the Dislike button.

patches.name: Disable edge-to-edge display
patches.description: Disable forced edge-to-edge display on Android 15+ by changing the app's target SDK version. This patch does not work if the app is installed by mounting.

patches.name: Disable forced auto audio tracks
patches.description: Adds an option to disable audio tracks from being automatically enabled.

patches.name: Disable forced auto audio tracks
patches.description: Adds an option to disable audio tracks from being automatically enabled.

patches.name: Disable forced auto captions
patches.description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

patches.name: Disable forced auto captions
patches.description: Adds an option to disable captions from being automatically enabled.

patches.name: Disable haptic feedback
patches.description: Adds options to disable haptic feedback when swiping in the video player.

patches.name: Disable layout updates
patches.description: Adds an option to disable layout updates by server.

patches.name: Disable music video in album
patches.description: Adds option to redirect music videos from albums for non-premium users.

patches.name: Disable resuming Miniplayer on startup
patches.description: Adds an option to disable the Miniplayer 'Continue watching' from resuming on app startup.

patches.name: Disable resuming Shorts on startup
patches.description: Adds an option to disable the Shorts player from resuming on app startup when Shorts were last being watched.

patches.name: Disable screenshot popup
patches.description: Adds an option to disable the popup that appears when taking a screenshot.

patches.name: Disable sign in to TV popup
patches.description: Adds an option to disable the popup asking to sign into a TV on the same local network.

patches.name: Disable splash animation
patches.description: Adds an option to disable the splash animation on app startup.

patches.name: Enable debug logging
patches.description: Adds an option for debugging.

patches.name: Enable debug logging
patches.description: Adds an option for debugging and exporting RVX logs to the clipboard.

patches.name: Enable gradient loading screen
patches.description: Adds an option to enable the gradient loading screen.

patches.name: Enable landscape mode
patches.description: Adds an option to enable landscape mode when rotating the screen on phones.

patches.name: Flyout menu components
patches.description: Adds options to hide or change flyout menu components.

patches.name: Force hide player buttons background
patches.description: Removes, at compile time, the dark background surrounding the video player controls.

patches.name: Fullscreen components
patches.description: Adds options to hide or change components related to fullscreen.

patches.name: GmsCore support
patches.description: Allows the app to work without root by using a different package name when patched using a GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore vendor group ID
options.description: The vendor's group ID for GmsCore. Do not change this option, if you do not know what you are doing.

options.title: Check GmsCore
options.description:
Check if GmsCore is installed on the device and has battery optimizations disabled when the app starts. 

If GmsCore is not installed the app will not work, so disabling this is not recommended.

options.title: Disable Core Services
options.description:
To reproduce the playback issue, several core services, including PoToken, are disabled.

Do not enable this option unless you are testing at a low level.

options.title: Package name of YouTube
options.description: The name of the package to use in GmsCore support.

options.title: Package name of YouTube Music
options.description: The name of the package to use in GmsCore support.

options.title: Patch all manifest components
options.description: Patch all permissions, intents and content provider authorities supported by GmsCore.

patches.name: GmsCore support
patches.description: Allows the app to work without root by using a different package name when patched using a GmsCore instead of Google Play Services.

options.title: GmsCore vendor group ID
options.description: The vendor's group ID for GmsCore. Do not change this option, if you do not know what you are doing.

options.title: Check GmsCore
options.description:
Check if GmsCore is installed on the device and has battery optimizations disabled when the app starts. 

If GmsCore is not installed the app will not work, so disabling this is not recommended.

options.title: Disable Core Services
options.description:
To reproduce the playback issue, several core services, including PoToken, are disabled.

Do not enable this option unless you are testing at a low level.

options.title: Package name of YouTube
options.description: The name of the package to use in GmsCore support.

options.title: Package name of YouTube Music
options.description: The name of the package to use in GmsCore support.

options.title: Patch all manifest components
options.description: Patch all permissions, intents and content provider authorities supported by GmsCore.

patches.name: Hide Shorts dimming
patches.description: Removes, at compile time, the dimming effect at the top and bottom of Shorts videos.

patches.name: Hide Trending Today shelf
patches.description: Adds an option to hide the Trending Today shelf from search suggestions.

patches.name: Hide accessibility controls dialog
patches.description: Removes, at compile time, accessibility controls dialog 'Turn on accessibility controls for the video player?'.

patches.name: Hide account components
patches.description: Adds options to hide components related to the account menu.

patches.name: Hide action bar components
patches.description: Adds options to hide action bar components and replace the offline download button with an external download button.

patches.name: Hide action buttons
patches.description: Adds options to hide action buttons under videos.

patches.name: Hide ads
patches.description: Adds options to hide ads.

patches.name: Hide ads
patches.description: Adds options to hide ads.

patches.name: Hide ads
patches.description: Adds options to hide ads.

patches.name: Hide comments components
patches.description: Adds options to hide components related to comments.

patches.name: Hide feed components
patches.description: Adds options to hide components related to feeds.

patches.name: Hide feed flyout menu
patches.description: Adds the ability to hide feed flyout menu components using a custom filter.

patches.name: Hide layout components
patches.description: Adds options to hide general layout components.

patches.name: Hide layout components
patches.description: Adds options to hide general layout components.

patches.name: Hide overlay filter
patches.description: Removes, at compile time, the dark overlay that appears when player flyout menus are open.

patches.name: Hide player buttons
patches.description: Adds options to hide buttons in the video player.

patches.name: Hide player flyout menu
patches.description: Adds options to hide player flyout menu components.

patches.name: Hide player overlay filter
patches.description: Removes, at compile time, the dark overlay that appears when single-tapping in the player.

patches.name: Hide recommended communities shelf
patches.description: Adds an option to hide the recommended communities shelves in subreddits.

patches.name: Hide shortcuts
patches.description: Remove, at compile time, the app shortcuts that appears when the app icon is long pressed.

options.title: Hide Explore
options.description: Hide Explore from shortcuts.

options.title: Hide Subscriptions
options.description: Hide Subscriptions from shortcuts.

options.title: Hide Search
options.description: Hide Search from shortcuts.

options.title: Hide Shorts
options.description: Hide Shorts from shortcuts.

patches.name: Hide sidebar components
patches.description: Adds options to hide the sidebar components.

patches.name: Hook YouTube Music actions
patches.description: Adds support for opening music in RVX Music using the in-app YouTube Music button.

patches.name: Hook download actions
patches.description: Adds support to download videos with an external downloader app using the in-app download button.

patches.name: MaterialYou
patches.description: Applies the MaterialYou theme for Android 12+ devices.

patches.name: Miniplayer
patches.description: Adds options to change the in-app minimized player, and if patching target 19.16+ adds options to use modern miniplayers.

patches.name: Navigation bar components
patches.description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the navigation bar.

patches.name: Navigation bar components
patches.description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the navigation bar.

patches.name: Open links directly
patches.description: Adds an option to skip over redirection URLs in external links.

patches.name: Open links externally
patches.description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of in the in-app-browser.

patches.name: Open links externally
patches.description: Adds an option to always open links in your browser instead of the in-app browser.

patches.name: Overlay buttons
patches.description: Adds options to display useful overlay buttons in the video player.

options.title: Icon type
options.description: The icon type.

options.title: Bottom margin
options.description: The bottom margin for the overlay buttons and timestamp.

options.title: Wider between-buttons space
options.description: Prevent adjacent button presses by increasing the horizontal spacing between buttons.

options.title: Change top buttons
options.description: Change the icons at the top of the player.

patches.name: Override certificate pinning
patches.description: Overrides certificate pinning, allowing to inspect traffic via a proxy.

patches.name: Player components
patches.description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the player.

options.title: Swipe to dismiss miniplayer
options.description:
Adds an option to enable swipe to dismiss the miniplayer.

If this patch option is enabled, the empty miniplayer may not show when the miniplayer is dismissed.

patches.name: Player components
patches.description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the video player.

patches.name: Remove background playback restrictions
patches.description: Removes restrictions on background playback, including for kids videos.

patches.name: Remove background playback restrictions
patches.description: Removes restrictions on background playback, including for music and kids videos.

patches.name: Remove subreddit dialog
patches.description: Adds options to remove the NSFW community warning and notifications suggestion dialogs by dismissing them automatically.

patches.name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
patches.description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

patches.name: Remove viewer discretion dialog
patches.description: Adds an option to remove the dialog that appears when opening a video that has been age-restricted by accepting it automatically. This does not bypass the age restriction.

patches.name: Restore old style library shelf
patches.description: Adds an option to return the Library tab to the old style.

patches.name: Return YouTube Dislike
patches.description: Adds an option to show the dislike count of songs using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

patches.name: Return YouTube Dislike
patches.description: Adds an option to show the dislike count of videos using the Return YouTube Dislike API.

patches.name: Return YouTube Username
patches.description: Adds an option to replace YouTube handles with usernames in comments using YouTube Data API v3.

patches.name: Return YouTube Username
patches.description: Adds an option to replace YouTube handles with usernames in comments using YouTube Data API v3.

patches.name: Sanitize sharing links
patches.description: Adds an option to sanitize sharing links by removing tracking query parameters.

patches.description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the seekbar.

patches.name: Set Transcript Cookies
patches.description: Adds an option to set Cookies in YouTube Transcript API requests.

patches.name: Settings for Reddit

options.title: RVX settings menu name
options.description: The name of the RVX settings menu.

patches.description: Applies mandatory patches to implement RVX Morphed settings into the application.

options.title: Insert position

options.title: RVX settings label
options.description: The name of the RVX settings menu.

patches.description: Applies mandatory patches to implement RVX Morphed settings into the application.

options.title: Insert position

options.title: RVX settings label
options.description: The name of the RVX settings menu.

patches.name: Shorts components
patches.description: Adds options to hide or change components related to YouTube Shorts.

patches.name: Snack bar components
patches.description: Adds options to hide or change components related to the snack bar.

options.title: Corner radius
options.description: Specify a corner radius for the snack bar.

options.title: Apply corner radius to playlist bottom bar
options.description: Whether to apply the same corner radius to the bottom bar of the playlist as the snack bar.

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Specify a background color for the snack bar. You can specify hex color (#AARRGGBB) or color resource reference.

options.title: Light theme background color
options.description: Specify a background color for the snack bar. You can specify hex color (#AARRGGBB) or color resource reference.

options.title: Stroke color
options.description: Specify a stroke color for the snack bar. You can specify hex color.

patches.name: SponsorBlock
patches.description: Adds options to enable and configure SponsorBlock, which can skip undesired video segments, such as non-music sections.

patches.name: SponsorBlock
patches.description: Adds options to enable and configure SponsorBlock, which can skip undesired video segments, such as sponsored content.

patches.name: Spoof Wi-Fi connection
patches.description: Spoofs an existing Wi-Fi connection.

patches.name: Spoof app version
patches.description: Adds options to spoof the YouTube client version. This can be used to restore old UI elements and features.

patches.name: Spoof app version for lyrics
patches.description: Adds options to spoof the YouTube Music client version. This can be used to restore old lyrics UI.

patches.name: Spoof signature
patches.description: Spoofs the signature of the app.

options.title: Package name
options.description: Package name.

options.title: Certificate data
options.description: Base64-encoded string of the certificate.

patches.name: Swipe controls
patches.description: Adds options for controlling volume and brightness with swiping, and whether to enter fullscreen when swiping down below the player.

patches.name: Theme
patches.description: Changes the app's themes to the values specified in patch options.

options.title: Dark theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

options.title: Light theme background color
options.description: Can be a hex color (#AARRGGBB) or a color resource reference.

patches.name: Toolbar components
patches.description: Adds options to hide or change components located on the toolbar, such as the search bar, header, and toolbar buttons.

patches.name: Translations for YouTube
patches.description: Add translations or remove string resources.

options.title: Custom translations
options.description:
The path to the 'strings.xml' file.
Please note that applying the 'strings.xml' file will overwrite all existing translations.

options.title: Translations to add
options.description: A list of translations to be added for the RVX settings, separated by commas.
options.default: ar, bg-rBG, de-rDE, el-rGR, es-rES, fr-rFR, hu-rHU, id-rID, in, it-rIT, ja-rJP, ko-rKR, pl-rPL, pt-rBR, ru-rRU, tr-rTR, uk-rUA, vi-rVN, zh-rCN, zh-rTW

options.title: String resources to keep
options.description:
A list of string resources to be kept, separated by commas.
String resources not in the list will be removed from the app.

Default string resource, English, is not removed.
options.default: af, am, ar, ar-rXB, as, az, b+es+419, b+sr+Latn, be, bg, bn, bs, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-rAU, en-rCA, en-rGB, en-rIN, en-rXA, en-rXC, es, es-rUS, et, eu, fa, fi, fr, fr-rCA, gl, gu, hi, hr, hu, hy, id, in, is, it, iw, ja, ka, kk, km, kn, ko, ky, lo, lt, lv, mk, ml, mn, mr, ms, my, nb, ne, nl, no, or, pa, pl, pt, pt-rBR, pt-rPT, ro, ru, si, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, sw, ta, te, th, tl, tr, uk, ur, uz, vi, zh, zh-rCN, zh-rHK, zh-rTW, zu

patches.description: Add translations or remove string resources.

options.title: Custom translations
options.description:
The path to the 'strings.xml' file.
Please note that applying the 'strings.xml' file will overwrite all existing translations.

options.title: Translations to add
options.description: A list of translations to be added for the RVX settings, separated by commas.
options.default: el-rGR, es-rES, fr-rFR, hu-rHU, id-rID, in, it-rIT, ja-rJP, ko-rKR, pl-rPL, pt-rBR, ru-rRU, tr-rTR, uk-rUA, vi-rVN, zh-rCN, zh-rTW

options.title: String resources to keep
options.description:
A list of string resources to be kept, separated by commas.
String resources not in the list will be removed from the app.

Default string resource, English, is not removed.
options.default: af, am, ar, ar-rXB, as, az, b+es+419, b+sr+Latn, be, bg, bn, bs, ca, cs, da, de, el, en-rAU, en-rCA, en-rGB, en-rIN, en-rXA, en-rXC, es, es-rUS, et, eu, fa, fi, fr, fr-rCA, gl, gu, hi, hr, hu, hy, id, in, is, it, iw, ja, ka, kk, km, kn, ko, ky, lo, lt, lv, mk, ml, mn, mr, ms, my, nb, ne, nl, no, or, pa, pl, pt, pt-rBR, pt-rPT, ro, ru, si, sk, sl, sq, sr, sv, sw, ta, te, th, tl, tr, uk, ur, uz, vi, zh, zh-rCN, zh-rHK, zh-rTW, zu

patches.name: Video playback
patches.description: Adds options to customize settings related to video playback, such as default video quality and playback speed.

patches.name: Video playback
patches.description: Adds options to customize settings related to video playback, such as default video quality and playback speed.

patches.name: Visual preferences icons for YouTube
patches.description: Adds icons to specific preferences in the settings.

options.title: RVX settings menu icon
options.description: The icon for the RVX settings menu.

options.title: Apply to all settings menu
options.description:
Whether to apply Visual preferences icons to all settings menus.

If true: icons are applied to the parent PreferenceScreen of YouTube settings, the parent PreferenceScreen of RVX settings and the RVX sub-settings (if supported).

If false: icons are applied only to the parent PreferenceScreen of YouTube settings and RVX settings.

patches.name: Visual preferences icons for YouTube Music
patches.description: Adds icons to specific preferences in the settings.

options.title: RVX settings menu icon
options.description: The icon for the RVX settings menu.

patches.name: Watch history
patches.description: Adds an option to change the domain of the watch history or check its status.

patches.name: Watch history
